term.title: electroviscous effects

item.text: For dispersions of charged particles, these are those components of the viscosity connected with the charge of the particles.

sources.item: PAC, 1979, 51, 1213. 'Terminology and Symbols in Colloid and Surface Chemistry Part 1.13. Definitions, Terminology and Symbols for Rheological Properties' on page 1217 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac197951051213)

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
